Vivek is one of the most intelligent and hard working people whom I have ever had the pleasure to meet. He arrives early, stays late, and always finds innovative and efficient ways to get things accomplished. He is an established professional presenter, outstanding speaker, and brilliant thinker. Lightning fast thinker, might I add! If you ever need to improve metrics, need some innovation, or need a leader, hire Vivek.

May 2, 2014, Rudy and Vivek were students together

Vivek is intensely passionate about expanding knowledge-not only his but of those around him.  He brings a tireless spirit to the team he is part of.  Showing great compassion for others, he dedicates his personal time to spread pertinent information, a fact evidenced by his personal lectures delivered to our Business Management class on several occasions.  Without a doubt, I know I can count on Vivek to provide great insights into any situation.  It was a true pleasure working and learning with him over the course of our program.

summary: I co-founded NeoLight, a medical device company developing disruptive phototherapy technology to treat Jaundice. The applications rolled out of this technology will be the world's fastest and the most efficient devices to treat Jaundice. The prototypes were developed in collaboration with engineers from the Arizona State University and Dignity Health, the fourth largest hospital network in the US and the Childrens Hospital of Los Angeles.
name: Vivek Kopparthi
title: Co-founder & CEO at NeoLight, Forbes 30under30
